oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Jackson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stamped black and white oval image of Andrew Jackson surrounded by color American Flag and gold eagle. Also includes very brief biographical information of Andrew Jackson. Flag and eagle are embossed.
Seventh President of the United States; General of the United States Army; Lawyer; Plantation Owner
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flags; Eagles; Symbols; Presidents
